item.description:
• We have approximately 9-12 but can accommodate a few more. Buy in is only $10 with  no re-buys as it is a week night. This is a friendly, game of Texas Hold'em with people who have played before and know the basics.   Repeats every 2nd & 4th Wed of each month.

    Also will be collecting $1 for our Chip Fund, Thank you.

    Feel free to bring the beverage &/or munchies of your choice plus we will serve simple munchies.

    Hope you can make it.

    Darlene & Dave
item.how_to_find_us: We are at the top of Rt 69 towards Wolcott near Cedar Lake.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Texas Hold'em Poker Tournament at the Rubinos House
